dcterms:creator: X. Wang
J. Yamagishi
dcterms:description: The ASVspoof 2019 LA dataset is widely used for spoofing detection research, featuring a diverse range of attacks including TTS and VC attacks, and is structured into training, development, and evaluation subsets to facilitate generalization evaluation.
dcterms:title: ASVspoof 2019 LA

dcterms:creator: V. Panayotov
G. Chen
W. K. M. Wong
C. Y. Lee
S. Y. K. Lee
dcterms:description: LibriSpeech is an ASR corpus based on public domain audio books, providing a large dataset of read speech in English, which is utilized for training models in speech recognition tasks.
dcterms:title: LibriSpeech
